page.title: 06Ardleigh School Garden
page.content: In our School pond we found a lot of {Carnivorous creatures}such as Pondskaters , Water boatmen , Water Mites , Common Newt Tadpoles and Mayfly Nymphs . We also found a few {Herbivores}like the Great Pond Snail. We found a{Great crested Newt}and we kept it in class. Soon it laid its eggs{singly}on the pond weed. After two days we returned it to the pond.We syphoned out some pond water and put it under the{microscope}we saw a Daphnia. The Pond is about 2.9 by 6 metres. In the school garden we get large numbers of Stag Beetles, with a length of up to 7cm. They are the {biggest beetles}in Britain, the males have horns of up to 2cm long , they may look dangerous but they do not hurt as much as the females ,whose antlers are only about .5 cm long.
